external_games.name: Race for the Galaxy: Rebel vs Imperium

name: Race for the Galaxy: Rebel vs. Imperium
summary: Requires The Gathering Storm Expansion. As the Imperium crushes outlying systems, the Rebels ally and strike back.This expansion adds 3 new start worlds, 41 new game cards, 5 more goals, and start world choice, plus an optional takeover system, allowing players to attack other players' worlds.
